name: Moon Rat
description:
The moon is falling! At least pieces of moon, and it smells like cheese! Make your way through 3 levels where the cheese will make you feel like you're on the moon!

Game created for Mini Jam 130: Lunar. Made in 3 days!

this is my first game to be released to the public, any feedback is appreciated.

Controls:

  • Left and Right - Move your Character
  • Up  - Jump
  • Down - Eat Cheese (if you have) and get bigger jumps!
